'Terminus' is a monospaced bitmap font designed by Dimitar Zhekov. The font is
designed with a goal to be easy on eyes during long hours in front of the
computer screen. Terminus is suitable for viewing .nfo files and other types of
ASCII art. http://home.gna.org/nfoview/ The bitmap font is available
in many Linux distributions, and there is also a third-party TrueType version
for use on other operating systems.
